"Oh! Good day! Patty n' Tea here!": "Ah, <%me>. We're discussing operation impressions for the upgraded A.I.S. right now."
"They call themselves informants, and apparently they've heard opinions from other ARKS members."
"Alright, why don't you two tell me your own personal opinions now?"
"Wow Ludmilla, you've got a great eye if you're singling us out for info."
"We do have experience piloting the A.I.S., so please let us know how we can help."
"Yeah, yeah! We're always the ones doing the interviewing, so it's kinda fun being the interviewee once in a while!"
"I'm the only one of us who ever does any interviewing... You should really start doing some yourself, Patty."
"Alrighty then! Ask me anything!"
"Are you even listening to me?"
"Then let's start with the basics. How is the mobility in outer space? Do you feel any effects on your body?"
"Ahh, well it's a kinda more floaty feeling than when we're above land. Sometimes it gets like \"hrng!\" though."
"Ah, um... Okay, how about the kickback from the Hi-Boost?"
"That one starts like \"bam!\" and gets all \"gwah!\", right? I like that one!"
"Uh-huh, I see... How about you, Tea?"
"In space, it can be difficult to tell up from down sometimes."
"There's a bit of pressure during Hi-Boost, but I don't think it's enough to cause any concern."
"I see! What do you think of the firing accuracy?"
"I think if they used live ammunition, air resistance would have a greater influence, but because they use Photon bullets, it's less of an issue..."
"Okie-doke! Got any more questions for me?"
"Ah, I'm all done with you. Thank you very much."
"Oh yeah <%me>. I'd like to ask your opinion later too. Now, if you don't mind more questions Tea..."
"Don't ignore me! I wanna answer too!"
